projects.name: 7th Continent
projects.description: The 7th Continent is a cooperative game of adventure, exploration and survival, for 1 to 4 players, inspired by the adventure books where ”you are the hero“. It’s also, thanks to the support of over 12,000 backers, one of the biggest board game worlds ever created!
projects.fundsUse: The cost of making this game is high, notably due to the quality of its components. Due to this a retail version of the game is almost unfeasible.

projects.name: Star Citizen
projects.description: Star Citizen is an upcoming massively multiplayer, space trading and combat video game for Microsoft Windows and Linux.
projects.fundsUse: The great news is that we’ve already raised enough money to ensure this project will happen! But we don’t want to stop there. We have a lot more we want to add to Star Citizen and we need your help to do it!

projects.name: C&H Adventure Game
projects.description: The game will be a new approach to point-and-click adventures, filled with dark comedy, drama, weirdness, and an apocalypse in the suburbs. This is the first time we're making something set in the unified C&H Universe, so we're completely excited to be making this for you!
projects.rewards: A cyanide pill and a little happiness.
